name: JulieRyanAngelicAttendants
0:
”Alexa, open Julie Ryan Angelic Attendants”
”who is Julie Ryan?”
”what are the phases of transition?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: julie ryan angelic attendants
des:
Welcome to the Julie Ryan Angelic Attendants Skill, hosted by medical intuitive, psychic, author and inventor of medical equipment, Julie Ryan. You’ll be inspired and captivated everyday with Julie’s collection of audio excerpts from her book, “Angelic Attendants” where she describes the Twelve Phases of Transition. You can also ask Julie Ryan a variety of questions about past lives, energy healing , spirit guides and much more!

We’ll be adding new features soon, so make sure to check in every day – and enjoy! 

Once you enable the skill, simply say, “Alexa, open Julie Ryan Angelic Attendants” and Alexa will present you with two options: 

- Listen to an Audio Excerpt
- Ask a Question 

You can say, “Listen to an Audio Excerpt” to hear audio excerpts from Julie Ryan’s book, “Angelic Attendants” where she describes the Twelve Phases of Transition™.

A few examples include;

- Phase One
- Phase Two: Parents Arrive
- Phase Three: Angels Arrive
- Phase Six: Spirits Arrive
- Phase Ten: Vacuum Forms above head to help spirit separate from the body

And more!


Or, you can choose to “Ask a Question” about the process of energetic healings, , past lives, spirit guides and much more. Example questions include;

- “What is a Medical Intuitive?”

- “Was Edgar Cayce a Healer?”

- “What is a Past Life?”

- “What can I Learn from My Past Life?”

- “What’s the Difference Between a Live Spirit and a Dead One?”

- “What are Spirit Guides?”

- “Does Everyone Have a Spirit Guide?”

- “What Do Spirit Guides Do?”

- “How Can I Communicate with My Spirit Guide?”

- “My Mother died, Why Are We Feeling Such Negative Energy in Our Home?”

Any time you need a little help within the skill, just say “Help” for guidance. 

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. Please call your doctor to receive medical advice.

FEEDBACK
To send us feedback or ask questions, email us at alexa@askjulieryan.com

A Sampling of Reviews from “Angelic Attendants” by Julie Ryan:

“Julie Ryan’s book, “Angelic Attendants”, is one of the most helpful I’m reading. Knowing is healing, and Julie has taught me the process of transition from our physical to back to our spirit.” – D.J. Bright

“This wonderful heart warming book dismisses the fears of the dying process and going into a void alone. I would recommend this book for those with a fear of death, those grieving a lose and those that have loved ones who are ill and transitioning. ”- Dianne Morgan

“This book is really informative. Julie's perspective of a sort of "countdown" makes you realize it's a natural process, not to be feared, but to be experienced. So glad I found her book because the information makes a difficult situation, from a broader view, much easier to understand and accept.” – Stacey Moore



About Julie Ryan
Hello, I’m a medical intuitive. I can facilitate energetic healings, I can see energy fields—and I can communicate with spirits both alive and dead. I can work from anywhere; it’s rare I’m with someone while scanning them.

In addition, I can scan animals, access people’s past lives, and remove ghosts from homes and other buildings, and I can tell how close to death someone is.

Although the medical intuitive aspect of my life has been an amazing side interest, I’m basically a businesswoman, an inventor, an author, and a serial entrepreneur. During my 35-year career, I’ve invented surgical devices that are sold throughout the world and founded several companies in the medical, natural gas, advertising, long-term care, compliance, and data breach prevention industries.


• To learn more about Julie Ryan visit: AskJulieRyan.com
• Listen to Julie Ryan's Podcast: askjulieryan.com/podcast/
